title: Available for rent as soon as July 1st!
posting_body: This beautiful, well-maintained duplex is in the heart of Lakewood.
Lots of charm and unique features, including gorgeous built-in china cabinets in the dining room.
3 bedrooms, 1 bath, plus balcony.
You pay Gas, Electric, and internet/cable if you choose to have it.
Cold Water/Sewer and Trash included in the rent.
3 parking spots on the premises included in the rent.
Friendly landlord who maintains and cares for the home.
First floor unit.
Within walking distance from Angelo's Pizza, voted best pizza in Cleveland!
Less than a 5 minute drive to the RTA Triskett Station if you work downtown.
Extremely easy access to the highway.
Walking distance to a beautiful park and the library.
Must be a non-smoker and no pets allowed.
3BR / 1Ba available July 1st!
duplex
w/d in unit
Central heat and AC
all kitchen appliances including dishwasher
3 parking spots next to the house
no smoking
no pets
